about_the_game:
We have created "Anime DLC" especially for fans of Asian curves. Let yourself be seduced by true beauty by replacing the basic character with someone you cannot take your eyes off of. We guarantee a completely new feeling from the game and a great freshness that this DLC gives.

Main features:

New playable character

The new character in the game will allow you to empathize with a completely different character and gain new gameplay experiences. At the same time, without changing the mechanics of key importance for the game

New soundtrack for the main character

New sounds for the main character will allow you to visualize what character we are dealing with. They give this character its own unique character

New special animations

New character animations will allow you to show off your feelings in single and multiplayer games. At the same time, it gives a lot of fun while playing
